legacy_yaml_domain.title: Obsolete YAML configuration detected
legacy_yaml_domain.description:
Your configuration.yaml still contains the legacy `{old_domain}:` root key. This integration has been renamed and the old YAML key is obsolete.

To fix this, either:
- Remove the `{old_domain}:` block and use the UI onboarding flow for `{new_domain}` instead, or
- Rename the root key from `{old_domain}:` to `{new_domain}:` if you want to keep a manual YAML configuration.

legacy_config_entry.title: Legacy integration detected
legacy_config_entry.description:
A config entry from the legacy integration `{old_domain}` is still present. The integration was renamed to `{new_domain}`.

Remove the legacy entry and set up `{new_domain}` again (UI onboarding recommended), or migrate your YAML root key if you used manual configuration.
